name: Joshua Eliser
text: As always, a wonderful place to visit and see the vegetables in the garden growing.  There was an event today for the FarmBot, and it was great to see the work being done to blend technology and agriculture.

resp.text: Thank you for attending and supporting our efforts!

name: John Stanners
text: It's a wonderful place that shares with their elderly clients during the vegetable growing seasons.

resp.text: Volunteers like you make it all possible!!

name: David Browning
text: The work done here by these volunteers is paramount in caring for some of our elderly in Madison County. They can always use more help if you are looking into worth while causes locally. Call CASA of Madison County today to see how you can help these folks out.

name: Lindsay Wheeler
text: Volunteers welcome! Apply to be a volunteer at the CASA of Madison Website, or look them up on Facebook! See how you can make a difference in the community!

resp.text: Thank you Lindsay!  We definitely appreciate our volunteers! casamadisoncty.org

name: Joshua Bane
text: Such a cool place that will make an impact on our community! Good people! I'm blessed to be able to film a documentary on this project.

name: Kim Kennedy
text: You really have to check this out!  You can actually go and buy your fresh vegetables there and they do not pick them until you place your order.  You could not ask for any better!!

name: BONNIE CURRY
text: An Amazing blessing to the people of this community!!! The legacy of Aunt Katie, her tireless love of her fellow man and the impact she had on those who continue her journey.  GOD BLESS YOU GUYS

name: Cody Giles
text: Wonderful place, fresh produce. I would say farm to market, but they are the market! 10/10 would recommend

name: Carrie Harville
text: We LOVE this community garden!

name: Linda Patrick
text: This place is fantastic to buy vegetables and honey . The people that work there are not just nice but very knowledgeable of their craft. Just ask any question

name: yusef Pugh
text: Really enjoyed it!  Bought a tasty jar of honey.  They're doing a lot of great work at The Garden. Great service and wonderful people.

name: Linda Patrick
text: Love it and especially the honey the vegetables are very good flavor and when you cook them not like being in a greenhouse and then person that owned the place he is very knowledgeable of what the vegetable has in them how they are grown what season to plant them what season to crop them. And what Peak to harvest

name: Denise B
text: Great place to visit when you are thinking healthy, customers service was refreshing!

name: V S
text: I went to the community garden to get organically grown vegetables. The gardeners were very pleasant and helpful.

name: Kesi Bolden
text: I love it. Its beautiful and serene.

name: Ms Melody Rhines
text: Excellent experience, Mr Mike Jackson, awesome Master Gardener is Fabulous!

name: Angelika Gessner
text: Bought wonderful kale! Fresh food locally!

name: Steve Hartsock
text: Wonderful plants

name: Steve Patterson
text: This is a wonderful place, a gem for the community to share. Stop and check it out, contribute if you can.

name: Deborah Smith
text: What a wonderful garden to feed those in need & also for community to enjoy nature. Just a blessing to our community.

name: Kim Hollingsworth
text: Gateway Community Garden is a wonderful endeavor that grows vegetables, fruits, berries and gives the food to needed venues to serve women, children and senior citizens.  I adore volunteering there, everyone is nice and welcoming.

name: Amanda Jo Wright
text: The community garden is a great part of Pell City. There goal is to feed those in need of fresh free produce.

name: Laura Wilson
text: Pell City Gateway Community Garden is a nonprofit garden that grows food for the community.  100% of the produce is given to local organizations and individuals that feed the needy, underprivileged, or those without access to fresh vegetables.

name: Andou N. Jennifer
text: A place to grow fresh goods. You can eat healthier if you decide to plant some vegetables!

name: Rashmi Karki
text: Best vegetable, friuts and flower garden. Clean and peaceful environment

name: Travis Engram
text: Great local spot where you can rent a garden plot and grow your own food. We had a lot for 2 years before going raised beds in the yard. Awesome people and easy to deal with

name: D BS
text: Give your love/ dream of gardening a real touch...let's play again in soil..get nostalgic

name: Nic Tnt
text: Great place!!!!

name: Elizabeth Cameron
text: Great
